thread.title: Gary Lineker's ex-wife Danielle Bux 'is expecting her first child' with American beau Nate Greenwald
thread.title_full: Gary Lineker's ex-wife Danielle Bux 'is expecting her first child' with American beau Nate Greenwald

author: JJ Nattrass
title: Gary Lineker's ex-wife Danielle Bux 'is expecting her first child' with American beau Nate Greenwald
text:
They have been almost inseparable since the started dating early on in 2016. 
And it looks as though Danielle Bux and her boyfriend Nate Greenwald have taken their relationship to the next level, as the couple are reportedly expecting their first child. 
According to The Sun , the 37-year-old actress - who was married to Gary Lineker - and the American lawyer are "thrilled" with the news. Parents to be? (Photo: The Mega Agency) 
Danielle and Nate, who are believed to have struck up their romance in April last year, are said to have been trying to keep the news under wraps - but are over the moon. 
Speaking to newspaper, a source said: "She is thrilled and so excited she’s pregnant. 
“She’s been keeping it a secret until she was over 12 weeks but now she’s telling family and friends." According to The Sun, Danielle, 37, and Nate are "thrilled" with the news 
Mirror Celeb has contacted a representative of Danielle's for comment on the matter. 
The inside added that the Kicking Off actress had thought she had "missed out" on her chance to have any more children. 
“It’s nice because Gary never wanted to have kids with her," the source revealed. "That was one of the reasons they broke up." 
Danielle is already a mother to Ella, 14, from a previous relationship. The actress and ex Gary split in 2016, but have remained on good terms (Photo: Splash) 
She and Nate, 41, met when she moved state-side following the end of her six-year marriage to former England star,Gary. 
Gary, who has four grown-up sons from his first marriage to Michelle Cockayne, married the model in 2009. 
Despite the split the two exes have remained friends, and the insider also claimed the Match of the Day star was "happy" for Danielle. Like us on Facebook
